Name: Saarein
Review Text: Good beer, good food, excelent service. My favorite in Amsterdam now

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Very welcoming atmosphere! We had a great evening. Staff is lovely. Definitely will be back on our next trip to Amsterdam.

Name: Saarein
Review Text:
We stopped in the early afternoon for a beer but left shortly after as we never came across so rude and aggressively-behaving stuff.
Avoid this place if you don’t want your mood to be ruined for no reason.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Really nice and relaxed atmosphere. I was there early, so I have no idea how it as night time.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Great place with nice beer, friendly crowd and great bartenders. Would recommend it any day.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: The Stonewall Inn of the Amsterdam lesbian scene, this is definitely a local spot for locals, close friends and couples - unless you muster up the courage to talk to some other patrons. It is the type of place where everyone seems to know …

Name: Saarein
Review Text: One of the few lesbian bars left in Amsterdam. It's 3 stories (basement pool/smoking, entry way bar, and upstairs). The decoration is eclectic. The crowd is now a mixed crowd (neighborhood crowd - gay / straight / lesbian). It's a friendly place to check out and all people are welcome.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Great neighborhood lesbian bar with friendly service. They will take cash or credit. The best place to hang out is on the benches outside. There is a small sitting area upstairs and a tiny indoor smoking and pool room downstairs -which that is closed off.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Gave it a couple hours on a sunday afternoon.   There was one gay guy customer (the male bartender fawned over him and it was hard for me to get his attention to get a refill).  I was the only woman in the joint, wondering if the place …

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Great old 3-storey pub. It's a tight fit when it's full but the only women-first place left in Amsterdam and absolutely worthwhile. A nice selection of veggie/vegan snacks to boot

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Queerest place in the Jordaan area but inclusive and welcoming to anyone. Run by the fiercest and friendliest crew you will ever meet. Their history is very interesting, they began as a radical political lesbian café in the seventies. A …

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Really chilled out bar with good music, lovely friendly staff, pool table and indoor smoking area. The pizza is so good too! Go here. It will be your favourite place!

Name: Saarein
Review Text: There were more men that women when I went there. Good to meet people if you are a tourist, since is the only women's bar left a lot go there. It's a little tight, but has a welcome feeling to it

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Small, cosy and great neighborhood cafe open to anyone with a friendly atmosphere. Pool table, smoking table, vegan lunch on Saturdays and friendly staff.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Lovely falaffel with free salade bar. Great tahini saus, fresh salads. Cheap. A shame it's so small so there can only site around 8 persons..

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Great to meet Vametino who was an excellent host while we visited the bar which was one of the most interesting we spent time in durring our visit to Amsterdam.  The customer were all nice and interesting and we would highly recommend.

Name: Saarein
Review Text:
Dear Travelers,
If you are around, please go somewhere nice that you would get some okay treatment (at least average one) …

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Super cosy cafe with very nice and friendly staff

Name: Saarein
Review Text: As advertised, mostly lesbian bar. Wife and I enjoyed our beers and nice chat with the bartender and a couple customers before it started to get busy.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Cozy coffee/bar outside touristic area. Nice staff and some strong statements around the place in favor of LGBT+ community like the Unisex toilets. Thank you!!!

Name: Saarein
Review Text: A cosy little pub with a great selection of beer. We've only ever been mid-afternoon, when it's quiet, but the staff have always been very friendly.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: My wife and I stopped in here while we were in Amsterdam and loved it! Nice people and great atmosphere. Love from Tulsa, Oklahoma!

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Love this old school bar, pool is free, men are welcomed as long was they don't bother the woman. Lesbian feminist bar.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: nice pkace ,suitable for all kinds of ppl.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Upper floor is a bit more quiet, downstairs lively with a free pool table. Easy to find and get to, reasonable prices and nice girls.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: I loved it, it's a perfect quiet place for a date, have few drinks and nice talks... Worth to visit this place!

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Great bar staff and friendly customers. Nice place to chill for drinks, smokes and good company

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Nice, quiet place to grab a beer and chill. Cool people :)

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Nice small bar. Good beer choices and nice waitress

Name: Saarein
Review Text:
Good vibes, beautiful women
What else can one ask for? Defined a nice quiet hangout for lesbians in Amsterdam

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Friendly charming old school bar in heart of Jordaan. Big plus for the girl at the bar who puts everyone in a good mood

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Girls who love girls go to Saarein. Proud, but not anti male. They have passed that station. Like we all should.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Saturday night the bar was almost empty ... but it was ok the staff is cool and welcoming.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: The best lesbian bar in Amsterdam. ;)  and actually quite a good beer selection.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Nice and cozy place, however not for young people more for the older crowd.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Good and chill place

Name: Saarein
Review Text: The only lesbian bar in Amsterdam at the moment. For food, food music. Smoking room and pool table downstairs!!

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Another Institution in the heart of Amsterdam! Super lovely stuff and atmosphere!

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Best food for two weeks after travelling Germany, France and Holland.

Name: Saarein
Review Text: Quite good. Very hot inside on the top floor!
